snippet.title: Detritus - The Demons Quest. Part 1 : New world order.
snippet.description:
"After a nuclear holocaust in 2050 the last survivors of the civilized world formed a sanctuary on a small island in Europe, called Quarea. The island is ruled by demons that are good and bad, but the leader, Arrut Loopaz, is pure evil. He lives in the ruins of an ancient city on the island, the forbidden zone known as "Detritus".

 A game I started 13 years ago. I was in London with school class at that time and got this adventure pretty cheap. Even back then, the game was classified as bad ..really bad. Bad digitized screen, bad voice quality, puzzles without any logic and a general buggy-ness. Yes, every 5 minutes of playing there was the regular crash.
But despite all the flaws and drawbacks I was curious how the game would end and what was beyond the river with the water demon. Took me until 2011 to find out.
The few people that were playing that game got stuck because they couldn't get the crystal from Ryk and though, not please the water demon.
  
The point is: don't talk to Ryk or the Inquisitor. Give the ale directly to Ryk and he'll hand you the crystal right away. There's more surprise and even more game crash beyond the river. Watch Part 2.
